  • SEARCH: 
 

Package ohos.agp.components.listcomponent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemAnimation.ItemAnimationFinishedListener
    Implements the listening for the completion of all component animations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseItemAnimation
    An abstract class that inherits from ItemAnimation to provide simplified logic.
    ComponentOwner
    An encapsulation class that stores the component object, position, status, and other information.
    ComponentOwner.ComponentOwnerCleaner
    Implements the release of the local ComponentOwner object.
    DecelerateStickHelper
    Implements the sticky effect for the ListComponent in a linear layout for watches.
    DefaultItemAnimation
    Inherits from BaseItemAnimation, manages the animation execution sequence, and implements the remove, add, move, and change animations.
    ItemAnimation
    An abstract class that records the ComponentOwner information before and after the layout.
    ItemAnimation.ItemAnimationCleaner
    Implements the release of the native ItemAnimation object.
    ItemTouchExpand
    Implements the dragging and swiping effects for components.
    ItemTouchExpandCallback
    Functions as a bridge between users and the ItemTouchExpand object.
    ItemTouchExpandCallback.ItemTouchExpandCallbackCleaner
    Implements the release of the ItemTouchExpandCallback object.
    LaneInfoHelper
    A helper abstract class that manages lane information in the ListGridLayoutManager.
    LaneInfoHelper.LaneInfoHelperCleaner
    Implements the release of the local LaneInfoHelper object.
    LinearStickHelper
    A helper class that implements the linear stick effect.
    ListAdornment
    Implements special drawing and layout offsets for components in the provider's data set.
    ListAdornment.ListAdornmentCleaner
    Implements the release of the ListAdornment object.
    ListComponentPool
    Implements the caching of components to improve the sliding performance of the ListComponent.
    ListComponentPool.ListComponentPoolCleaner
    Implements the release of the ListComponentPool object.
    ListGridLayoutManager
    Inherits from ListLayoutManager and implements the grid layout of the ListComponent.
    ListLayoutManager
    An abstract class that manages the layout of the ListComponent.
    ListLinearLayoutManager
    Inherits from ListLayoutManager and implements the linear layout of the ListComponent.
    ListStaggeredGridLayoutManager
    Inherits from ListLayoutManager and implements the masonry layout of the ListComponent.
    ListState
    Implements the storage of various state information of the ListComponent.
    PagerStickHelper
    A helper class that implements the pager stick effect.
    Provider<E extends ComponentOwner>
    A base class that saves ListComponent data and sets up a relationship between the ComponentOwner and the ListComponent data.
    ProviderSubscriber
    An abstract class that implements the observer of the provider.
    StickHelper
    An abstract class that implements the stick effect for the ListComponent.
